text: Alphonse Poaty-Souchlaty (25 March 1941 â€“ 24 October 2024) was a Congolese politician. He was the Prime Minister of Congo-Brazzaville from 7 August 1989 to 3 December 1990 under President Denis Sassou Nguesso. Poaty-Souchlaty died on 24 October 2024, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of the Republic of the Congo
title: Alphonse Poaty-Souchlaty
